Rulings.Base: 1. Sending 1 WATER monster to the GY is a cost.\n2. [FORUM] If the effect of "Genex Undine" is activated,  the Turn Player must pay the cost right away, sending the 1 WATER monster from the Deck to the GY. After the effect is activated and all costs paid, the opponent would then be able to chain with the effect of "Effect Veiler".
